backend/main.mo: Actor managing surgery cases with CRUD operations, todo generation, and authorization checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration converting old surgery case records to new format by adding empty todos and initializing nextToDoId.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React application root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app with routing, authentication gating, theme provider, and inline login handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity and clearing query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Empty or placeholder file with no content provided.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Form component for creating or editing surgery cases using react-hook-form, including demographic fields and status checkboxes.
frontend/src/components/cases/QuickAddDe: Utility component that parses pasted or OCR-extracted text to auto-fill demographic fields, with camera support and manual editing.
frontend/src/components/cases/ToDoSectio: Renders and manages a case’s to-do list, allowing adding, completing, and deleting items via query hooks.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout with top navigation, content container, and footer including a caffeine.ai credit link.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Navigation bar showing branding, user identity, and login button, with click-to-home behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, persisted identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, updating, and deleting surgery cases, including helper logic for mapping form data to todo items.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with a teal clinical color scheme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CaseDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed case info with editing and deletion capabilities, using react-query mutations and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CaseListPage.tsx: Shows a searchable, sortable list of cases with import/export features and navigation to individual case pages.
frontend/src/pages/NewCasePage.tsx: Provides a form for creating a new case and handles submission with navigation and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/utils/dateTime.ts: Contains helpers for converting between bigint timestamps, Date objects, and YYYY-MM-DD formatted strings.
frontend/src/utils/demographicsParser.ts: Parses free‑text demographics into structured fields, extracting MRN, names, dates, species, breed, and sex with tracking for missing or uncertain data.
frontend/src/utils/ocrText.ts: Provides client-side OCR using the experimental TextDetector API, handling image loading, text extraction, and error cases.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL and hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, and theme settings with additional plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s feature list, requirements, and metadata describing app goals like editable demographics, todos, import/export, and sorting.
